value: . The The Blackstone Idol portrays Lord Ganesha in a magnificient standing pose which is unique to this famous place.

There are numerous outlets around Idagunji which sell Ganesha idols, pendents, Puja articles, Conches, brass articles.
There are a few small hotels around the temple which serve tea, South Indian dishes, and soft drinks.
There aren't really any good accomodations in Idagunji to recommend; better lodges and restaurants can be found in either
